channel.title: Hello, I'm Marc Roberts of Neutron Creations
channel.description:
Hello, I'm Marc and I work at neutroncreations.com. We build Ruby on Rails web apps for clients primarily but we're also working on a few side projects which we hope to move our focus on to in the not too distant future. I've discussed moving from client work to products with @drewm and @rachelandrew several times in the past and it'll be great to share our journey and experiences with this great community.
Thanks for setting this up.

item.title: Hello, I'm Marc Roberts of Neutron Creations
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Awesome, looking forward to hearing about your experiences.

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, I'm Marc Roberts of Neutron Creations
